common.alertReason: to protect our company’s data from getting lost or stolen
printOrSaveWarnReasons: No sensitive data in the site
uploadOrDownloadReasons: No sensitive data in the file

messages.companyBlockProtectionDisclaimer: To protect our company, the file was removed.
messages.downloadTimeout: The download has been cancelled due to scan timeout
messages.uploadTimeout: The upload has been cancelled due to scan timeout
messages.defaultWarnMessage: Are you sure you want to continue?
messages.companyProtectionDefaultMessage: to protect sensitive data from leaving the organization.

common.genericFileScanDescription:
To protect our company’s data
from external threats and data leakage

browserIsolationBlock.title: Browser Protection is Active
browserIsolationBlock.description: This site might not work as expected due to Browser Isolation protection

printWarn.title: Print sensitive data
printWarn.description:
This site contains sensitive data.
To protect our company, we recommend that you do not print from this site
printWarn.promptText: Provide a reason for printing from this site

saveWarn.title: Save sensitive data
saveWarn.description:
This site contains sensitive data.
To protect our company, we recommend that you do not save from this site
saveWarn.promptText: Provide a reason for saving from this site

antiPhishingBlock.title: Login to unknown site?
antiPhishingBlock.description:
This site isn’t recognized as a business application.
To protect our company we prohibit logging using business identifiers

antiPhishingWarn.title: Login to unknown site?
antiPhishingWarn.description:
This site isn’t recognized as a business application.
To protect our company, we recommend that you do not login to this site.
antiPhishingWarn.promptText: Provide a reason for entering credentials in this site
reasons: I require a one-time access to this site
This site is a known business application

secureStorage.title: File saved to Secure Storage
secureStorage.description: To protect our company's data from external threats.

authenticateToOneDrive.title: Saving file to OneDrive
authenticateToOneDrive.description: According to company policy, file will be saved to your OneDrive storage.

oneDriveSuccess.title: File saved to OneDrive
oneDriveSuccess.description: To protect our company's data from external threats and data leakage.

sanitizedSecureStorage.description: File has been sanitized and saved to secure storage to protect our company data from external threats.

secureViewer.title: File ready for Online View
secureViewer.description:
via Island secure viewer, to protect our
company’s data from external threats

sanitizedSecureViewer.description: File has been sanitized and ready for online view according to company policy

downloadSanitizedFormat.description: The file was sanitized, and its format was changed

downloadSavingToOneDrive.title: Saving file to OneDrive...
downloadSavingToOneDrive.description: File is being saved to OneDrive to protect our company's data and assets from external threats and data leakage.

uploadScanSuccess.title: File scanned successfully
uploadScanSuccess.description: Scan completed - file will be uploaded

downloadWarn.title: Sensitive Data Found
downloadWarn.promptText: Provide a reason for downloading the file

uploadWarn.title: Sensitive Data Found
uploadWarn.promptText: Provide a reason for uploading the file

pamAutofillSuggestions.errorTitle: Oops. Looks like something went wrong.
pamAutofillSuggestions.errorDescription: Please refresh the page and try again. If the issue persists, please contact your IT team.

fileVerdict.fileSizeExceededDownload: In order to protect our company, downloading large files isn't allowed.
fileVerdict.fileSizeExceededUpload: In order to protect our company, uploading large files isn't allowed.
fileVerdict.blockedSite: This site was identified as dangerous and was blocked according to company policy.
fileVerdict.unsupportedLocalUpload: According to the company policy, you can upload files only via secure storage

scanResult.threat: This file was found to be malicious and was removed.

unscannable.fileTooLarge: This file is too large to be scanned
unscannable.disconnected: The file couldn't be scanned due to network issues
unscannable.unsupportedFormat: This file type is not supported
unscannable.archiveTooDeep: This compress file contains too many files
unscannable.archiveContentTooLarge: The content of this compressed file is too large
unscannable.archiveItemCountTooLarge: This compressed file contains too many files
unscannable.unexpectedError: An error occurred during the scanning process
unscannable.noAvailableQuota: No available quota in the configured scanning service

cancel.wrongPasswordAttemptExceededDownload: Download cancelled due to too many wrong password attempts
cancel.wrongPasswordAttemptExceededUpload: Upload cancelled due to too many wrong password attempts

fileVerdict.dlpVerdict:
This file contains sensitive data.
To protect our company, we recommend that you do not download this file.

This file contains sensitive data.
To protect our company, we recommend that you do not upload this file.

screenshotProtectionBypass.title: Bypass and allow screen capture
screenshotProtectionBypass.description:
Screen capture will be enabled for this browsing session with extended monitoring.
Be cautious with the content shared.
screenshotProtectionBypass.promptText: Provide a reason for allowing screen capture

featureAnnouncement.accessUsingShortcutOrFromTopBarInstructi:
Access {{feature}} with <3>{{keyboardShortcut}}
or from the <5> Icon at the top bar.

clipboardManagerCopy.title: Copying just got a whole lot better
clipboardManagerCopy.content: Island Clipboard keeps your copy history just a click away. You can quickly search and paste your data as you need it.

clipboardManagerSmartClipsInsertion.title: You have just received a productivity boost!
clipboardManagerSmartClipsInsertion.content: Your organization automatically inserted data you need into your clipboard history. It is ready for you to use in Island Clipboard.

snippingTool.title: Don’t stop capturing!
snippingTool.content:
Island Capture is now available for you. Using Island Capture, you can capture, crop, and use your content anywhere on the web.
It’s ready to use and it is just a click away.
